item.title: Croxted Road SE21 a few yards from streetlight column ID number 423 # 24, 7th September
item.description:
Croxted Road SE21 a few yards from streetlight column ID number 423 # 24 (ie just south of Dalkeith Road junction – by house number 175) plastic coated green metal bicycle locker graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 187,189, Croxted Road, Dulwich, London

item.title: Can this paving be inspected?, 7th September

item.title: All of Priory Park Road, 7th September
item.description:
Lots of rubbish all over Priory Park Road. This road hasn’t been cleaned for over a week maybe! Rubbish all over the pavements and a mattress is fly tipped round the corner from St Julian’s Road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London

item.title: Dumping Rubbish on the street, 7th September
item.description:
10 Woodfield Road residents have been dumping their rubbish in front of our development. It is unpleasant, it is causing pest issues plus it makes it hard for wheelchair users to use the path as there is a care home in the corner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Woodfield Road, Maida Hill, London
